termsAndConditions.purposeOfTheSystem: The Calendar Event Scheduling System is designed to facilitate the scheduling, management, and tracking of official events and tasks within the DILG. It is intended for use by authorized personnel only.
userResponsibilities: Use the system in a manner that is lawful and in compliance with all relevant policies and procedures of the DILG.
Ensure that all information entered into the system is accurate and up-to-date.
Maintain the confidentiality of their login credentials and not share them with unauthorized individuals.
Report any suspicious activity or potential security breaches to the system administrator immediately.
prohibitedActivities: Using the system for any unauthorized or unlawful purposes.
Uploading or distributing any content that is illegal, harmful, or violates the rights of others.
Attempting to gain unauthorized access to the system or its related networks and data.
Engaging in any activity that disrupts or interferes with the proper functioning of the system.
